prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Bass, Pipe, Guitar, Strings, Piano, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Guitar, Strings, Synth Pad, Pipe, and Bass, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Strings, Bass, Synth Pad, Pipe, and Guitar, omitting Drums.

Style 3:
No Drums are included in this song, which is made up of Piano, Guitar, Strings, Synth Pad, Pipe, and Bass.
